arts.ttl: Hložek brace secures much-needed European victory for Hoffenheim
arts.sum: An Adam Hložek brace saw Hoffenheim secure their first European win of the season to ease the pressure on manager Pellegrino Matarazzo.

arts.ttl: Reports: Berisha dropped from Hoffenheim's squad to face Dynamo Kyiv due to spat with Matarazzo
arts.sum: Reports claim that Mergim Berisha will not be in Hoffenheim's squad to face Dynamo Kyiv in the Europa League for disciplinary reasons.

It is the sixth round of Bundesliga action between Friday and Sunday and with the October international break looming, Jack Ogalbe is backing leaders Bayern Munich to improve their position, and in style, when they head to second-placed Eintracht Frankfurt.

arts.ttl: Alexander Nübel and Oliver Baumann expected to share goalkeeping duties for Germany
arts.sum: Bild reports that Germany goalkeepers Alexander Nübel and Oliver Baumann will share the number one spot in the upcoming international break. Since Marc-André ter Stegen’s knee injury, the question of who…

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs. Dynamo Kyiv preview: Team news and predicted lineups
arts.sum: Here is our preview of Thursday's UEFA Champions League clash between TSG Hoffenheim and Dynamo Kyiv, including our predicted lineups.
